title: HERB-OX® INSTANT CHICKEN BROTH & SEASONING WITH OTHER NATURAL FLAVORS-VERY LOW SODIUM-NO PARSLEY (44937)

text:
Hormel Ingredients - Fats hacer su documentación disponible en las siguiente/s región/es
Norteamérica
HERB-OX® Chicken Broth and Seasoning Low Sodium granules are a uniform blend of dried free-flowing ingredients. The granules wet out quickly in hot water with only limited stirring and then quickly go into solution. HERB-OX® Instant Chicken Broth & Seasoning with Other Natural Flavors-Very Low Sodium-No Parsley is ready to consume as a tasty hot drink or as a flavoring in a dry pasta or soup mixes. It can be added to dips, sauces, stew or vegetables.
The granules dissolve into a light yellowish tan solution with chicken fat floating on the top. MSG has not been added to HERB-OX® Instant Chicken Broth & Seasoning with Other Natural Flavors-Very Low Sodium-No Parsley. Sodium has been reduced by substituting with potassium and other formulation changes.
Empresa
Hormel Foods Specialty Products - Fats is a segment belonging to overall Hormel Foods Specialty Products division of Hormel Foods. Their vast array of products are backed by Hormel's expertise and their attention to value and quality. Their goal is to have the Specialty Foods division serve as a "one-stop shop" for manufacturers both large and small. Their flavored fats are used to enhance salad, main entree, bakery and meat products. They are also used to boost flavors in gravies, sauces and soups.
La información presentada aquí fue adquirida por UL desde el productor del material. UL hace un esfuerzo considerable para asegurar la exactitud de estos datos. Sin embargo, UL no asume responsabilidad por los valores de los datos y alienta firmemente a que tras la selección final del material, los puntos de los datos sean validados con el proveedor de la materia
